home.slogan: You get the highest quality and service from experts
home.description_one: We organize all insurances, registration with the traffic police, service and maintenance
home.description_three: You get an individual approach and focus on your needs

brands.title: Brands
brands.kia_description_part_one: 'VEKO OIL' Ltd. is an official dealer of
brands.kia_description_part_two: brand cars for the cities of Ruse, Gabrovo and Veliko Tarnovo, as well as of SUBARU brand cars for Northern Bulgaria. In 2019, the company became the official representative of the South Korean car manufacturer KIA for Ruse and the region. In both cities, there are modern buildings with a showroom offering all models of the KIA and Subaru brands and workshops equipped with the most modern equipment for prevention, service and repair.
brands.subaru_description: SUBARU continuously strives to produce cars that offer excellent levels of safety in all road conditions, excellent dynamics and intelligent driving assistants. This is the basis of every vehicle that SUBARU produces. The brand's Symmetrical All Wheel Drive system is at the heart of this concept. The all-wheel drive is designed to be perfectly symmetrical with a low center of gravity, thanks to the horizontal Subaru Boxer engine, the Japanese car brand SUBARU has been a leader in the industry for 65 years. For 40 years it has been famous for its extremely reliable boxer engines, and for more than 30 years it has been a symbol of high cross-country ability thanks to the patented symmetrical four-wheel drive system
brands.dongfeng_description: The showroom is an importer of cars of the famous Dongfeng brand. It supplies quality, EU-certified products with modern European design, advanced technologies and safety systems, with an unprecedented warranty on the market. Passenger vehicles cover various model types including sedan, SUV, MPV, mini car, etc., and off-road special vehicles cover desert vehicles, off-road 4WD trucks, and more. New energy vehicles cover various types of hybrid vehicles, BEVs, natural gas vehicles, etc.
brands.tenax_description: As an official Talaria dealer, 'VEKO OIL' Ltd. believes in electric vehicles as the future of mobility. Our mission is to offer customers the best of the electric motorcycle world while providing uncompromising quality and professional service.

ecology.title: Ecology
ecology.paragraph: “VEKO OIL“ Ltd. holds permit No. 010-ДО-686-00 dated 14.06.2012 from RIOSV - city of Ruse for carrying out activities on collection, temporary storage and transportation of waste throughout the country. The company offers consultations, preparation of documents under the Environmental Protection Act, conclusion of a waste contract with a licensed company. The company has developed a program for the following types of waste management activities:
ecology.list_item_one: acceptance of used /waste/ oils from the end user, and from the sites for temporary storage of oils, which were formed as a result of the operation of the machinery and equipment of legal entities, code: 13.02.05*, 13.02.06*, 13.02.08 *, 13.01.10*, 13.01.11*, 13.01.13*, 13.03.07*, 13.03.08*, 13.03.10*, 13.05.06*, 13.05.07*;
ecology.list_item_three: absorbents, filter materials, wipes and protective clothing contaminated with dangerous substances, code: 15.02.02*;
ecology.list_item_five: fluorescent tubes and other waste containing mercury, code: 20.01.21*;
ecology.paragraph_two: The company sites for temporary storage of used oils are located as follows:
ecology.list_item_seven: Site No. 1 - Veliko Tarnovo, Magistralna St. No. 9;
ecology.list_item_eight: Site No. 2 - Gabrovo, Hristo Smirnenski St. No. 41.
ecology.copy_permit: You can see a copy of the Permit

service_station.service_station_text: Premium service center VEKO is certified for warranty and non-warranty servicing of KIA and SUBARU brand cars. It has the latest generation of diagnostic equipment, specialized tools and original spare parts. It is equipped with a bench for adjusting the geometry of the front and rear axles of light and 4x4 cars, a gas analyzer, a machine for charging air conditioners, machines for mounting and balancing tires, a car wash. Thanks to the modern equipment and qualification of the personal service, it performs out-of-warranty service activities on all makes and models of cars.
service_station.engines_text: Repair, prevention and servicing of engines and gearboxes. Checking the condition of the engine, turbine, fuel system, clutch and all the important elements for the good operation of your car.
service_station.electronics_text: Electrical repairs of dynamos and starters, computer diagnostics, troubleshooting of all systems in the car. Sale, service and installation of batteries MonBat, Bosch, Gigawath.
service_station.liquid_check_text: Checking the level of antifreeze, wiper fluid, hydraulic fluid and more. If necessary – replacement, addition or repair of the given system.
service_station.oil_change_text: Sale and change of engine, gearbox, hydraulic and transmission oils with the brands TEXACO, Valvoline, Mobil, Shell.
service_station.filters_change_text: Baldwin and Fleetguard brand oil, air, fuel, hydraulic and cabin filter changes.
service_station.climatic_systems_text: Diagnosis, inspection, prevention, repair and charging of air conditioning systems.
service_station.tires_text: Change of tires, linings, brake discs, brake fluid, adjustment and geometry stand of front and rear axle, undercarriage repairs.
service_station.full_computer_diagnostic_text: Comprehensive diagnostics and inspection of all electronic, electrical and mechanical systems in the car. Computer diagnostics of fuel system, engine and electronics. Inspection of suspension, brakes, tires and others.
service_station.auto_accessories_text: We have auto cosmetics and consumables from leading global manufacturers - VEKO, Osram.
service_station.repair_services_text: The workshop provides mechanical and powder coating services for cars that have suffered an accident.

used_cars.title: Used cars
used_cars.autopilot_check: System for control of the power (autopilot)

insurance.travel_insurances: Travel insurance, accident, liability and more.

veko_products.text: The company is engaged in the production of antifreeze, wiper fluids, fuel additives and improvers, auto cosmetics and household products. It has its own modern laboratory, where daily incoming control of raw materials and outgoing control of finished products is carried out. Production complies with European standards for quality, safety of working conditions and environmental protection. For more information, you can visit the following

about.paragraph_text_one: “Veko Oil“ Ltd. was founded on February 19, 1997 in the city of Ruse, with the main activity of selling petroleum products, chemicals, auto accessories and auto cosmetics. The company also develops car service activities - from preventive maintenance to major repairs of cars and light trucks. “Veko Oil“ Ltd. is the main distributor for Central and North-Eastern Bulgaria of world-famous brands of petroleum products, as well as the products of various renowned manufacturers and importers.
about.paragraph_text_two: Since 2007, “Veko Oil“ Ltd. has been an official representative of the automobile brands “SUBARU“ and “KIA“ - new cars. Our strategy is aimed at careful and purposeful selection of suppliers with a proven name in the domestic and international market. Thus, we believe that we offer our customers and partners only certified, quality products and services. The successful development of our company over the years is due to the careful building of a team of professionals applying innovative solutions in the field of supply of goods and services, safety and protection of our surrounding environment.
about.paragraph_text_three: We don't just sell goods, we satisfy specific needs.
